ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Waki or Yaki... Was Claw Hype
ygData.msgSnippet: ... mob ... mobs ... Jig ... hehe, so in other words, my current SOP for Kedge Keep and Dragon raids will be my SOP for the Planes as well :).  O well, guess
ygData.messageBody:
> Getting back to the planes. If you are set for a pull and know what the
mob
> will fight you with, you can select songs accordingly. There are some
mobs
> that do AE cancel magic or pilliage enchantment (they strip your buffs.)
> There is another one that does AE drain stamina (excellent time to play
Jig
> of Vigor - no stamina means slower weapon speed and casters cant med when
> they have 0 stamina.) Some mobs have poison base and others have disease
> base and of course some have magic base. So, the Planar bard should know
> these things and be ready to provide the appropriate resist buffs.

hehe, so in other words, my current SOP for Kedge Keep and Dragon raids will
be my SOP for the Planes as well :). O well, guess my melee skills were
maxed out and weren't going to get any better anyhow. Bye bye swords, hello
drums and lute!

Taneran Dreamweaver
<Clan Jax>
Bard of the 46th song
Prexus
